long_description: This Crazy Creek Large chair is 2 in. wider than the Original chair for extra comfort while lounging by the campfire. 420-denier ripstop polyester stands up to regular use around camp. Sturdy, lightweight carbon fiber stays offer firm yet flexible support. Closed-cell foam padding provides comfort while camping. Webbing straps with quick-release buckles adjust your back angle for a wide range of sitting positions. Webbing loop handles let you easily transport the chair. Rip-and-stick straps keep the Crazy Creek Large chair folded flat for storage.
short_description: This Crazy Creek Large chair is 2 in. wider than the Original chair for extra comfort while lounging by the campfire.
